website_summaries.verdict: The best way to keep your dogs ears clean and smelling fresh for less.
pros: Quickly breaks down ear wax and other built-up dirt from inside your dog’s ear
Reduces strong, unpleasant ear odor instantly
Cleanser sits at a low price point
Tea tree oil is calming on sensitive ears
cons: Leaves a subtle green stain on the fur surrounding the ear
Can be removed with soapy water

customer_reviews.title: A MUST for healthy animal ears!
customer_reviews.text: If your dog gets ear infections buy this ASAP! We’ve been using it for 25+ years and have never had ear infections, ear mites, or yeast infections. We have spaniels so they don’t get a lot of air in their ears. Moisture causes issues in ears. Mites and bugs CANNOT live in tea tree oil. I use it after every bath, and about every 2 weeks as a preventative. Use everyday if dog has an ear infection or mites for 2 weeks. Just squirt some in ear, rub the lower ear and you’re done! Super easy! Can also be used for cats!
customer_reviews.author: Kristyn926

customer_reviews.title: Great Ear Wash, but Be Careful w/ Green Discoloration
customer_reviews.text: This ear wash worked great as far as cleaning my dog's ears, including when he had an acute otitis externa infection, and did not burn or sting him at all. When I smelled the solution in the bottle, I noticed it has a VERY strong teatree oil scent and was afraid that it would be overbearing when used. However, after cleaning my dog's ears, the scent was very light. My only concern with this ear wash is that it did leave a slight green discoloration on the fur around his ears (my dog is a light/blonde golden retriever), but the discoloration washed off easily with soap and water.
customer_reviews.author: GatorDO17

customer_reviews.title: My Black Lab Loves This Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: My ten year old black Lab has had an allergy to the grass here in southern Alabama since she was two years old. It affects her ears mostly and paws. She loves the soothing affect this ear wash presents. I've had Labs for years. They need care & attention forever. I've tried so many ear treatments, but this is the most gentle. I soak the end of a cotton ball & massage the ear with the cotton ball inside her ear canal. She shakes, gets a teat & she's good for the day. You can do it twice a day with no worries. Smells good too! So does her ear.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Best ear cleaner for a Lab
customer_reviews.text: I have spent probably thousands of dollars over the years to treat my 7 yr old labs ear allergies and have used countless Products. Combined with her regular regime of antihistamines this ear wash cleaner has been the best product as it breaks up the gunk in her ears and leaves it smelling nice. I used this regularly and since then her ear allergies have been kept at bay
customer_reviews.author: NerdGirl

customer_reviews.title: This really works !
customer_reviews.text: I bought the smaller bottle at a pet store . My white gsd was always itching in his ears. I even took him to the vet and they said allergies and they gave him apoquel.. but it has side effects. So using this ear wash saved us a lot of money. Since using this product he doesn’t scratch at his ears like he use to and the smell is not overbearing and there’s no residue or stickiness . Thumbs up for this ear wash 👍! I have purchased the large bottle !
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Really good product
customer_reviews.text: We use this NaturVet product to keep our Basset Hound's ears clean. Bassets are notorious for getting ear problems due to dirt, and this product is really effective at keeping their ears clean. We used it on Jasper and he never had an ear issue; in fact his vet used to comment on how his ears were always clean. We now use this same product on a Basset puppy and it keeps his ears clean too.
customer_reviews.author: JJW

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Dog Ear Wash- No Ear Infections So Far!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ear wash! When I first found it I actually took it with me to my dog's vet to make sure it was a good one, and she said it was a great choice. Of course my dog doesn't like getting his ears cleaned, but I imagine that's just from the odd sensation of liquid going in his ears, and not because this stings or anything. He's a flop-eared beagle/Basset hound mix, and in four years of using this he's never had an ear infection! I clean his ears with this every 1-2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: SWilliams

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of reaction.
customer_reviews.text: It may work for some pets. My dog had a definite reaction - she became confused and disoriented. Her breathing was shallow and she felt cold to the touch and was lethargic. It was quite bizarre and scary for both us.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: No more ear infections!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this ear cleaner for our lab and golden for many years. It is a good product and we've had good success in preventing ear infections with this clearer after the dogs swim or get a bath. The lab is prone to ear infections and since we started using this cleaner after swimming and baths and anytime his ears appear to be dirty we have not had a single ear infection. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: EGCG

customer_reviews.title: Good ear cleaner for dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have had English Springer Spaniel dogs for nearly 40 years. Their long, pendulous ears can be a magnet for infection if not kept c l.j ean. I find this ear wash easy to use and effective. I use it twice weekly. Fresh scent is pleasant and my little girl doesn't mind it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Shopgirl

customer_reviews.title: Works great smells great
customer_reviews.text: Cleaning my pups ears is way easier with this product the 1st time I used it I just squeezed it in his ears to get the big clumps out it cleaned the ears really well I used some on cotton balls for removing the rest on the outside his ears smelled amazing and the redness he had before I used the product went away in just 2-3 days beagles tend to get infections very easy this product has helped to eliminate them by working so well I wipe out his ears once a week I suggest buying the small bottle plus the gallon refill way less expensive this way in the long run
customer_reviews.author: karrie mccoy

customer_reviews.title: No infections
customer_reviews.text: When my Labrador was younger and we didn’t know about this product he’d get the occasional ear infection. We now use this after every bath and dry out his ears good after and he has had no problems since. It doesn’t leave his ears greasy, just a nice light scent.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mello

customer_reviews.title: NOT for CATS
customer_reviews.text: Marketed for cats but has tea tree oil which is bad for cats. I bought because of the reviews and without realizing this. This should NOT be used on cats!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product. Use it on my 65lb hound mix. Although he doesn't like me putting directly in his ears, I put some on an ear wipe and clean his ears that way. Product smells nice and it removes the dirt in his ears.
customer_reviews.author: BarbaraLMM

customer_reviews.title: Smells Good
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand for cleaning my rottweiler’s ears! I usually apply to a cotton ball and manually clean the inside of her ears. My only feedback would be that the top doesn’t always close and I accidentally wasted a bunch when it turned on it’s side a lot poured out, but the product itself works great. Cleans her ears without a fight, she doesn’t mind (She’s 2 now and we started this ritual when she 9 weeks). Plus it leaves her head smelling so clean and nice!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Happy Hound
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this product for several years now. We have a large hound dog who loves to swim in our backyard pool-before we found this ear wash, we were at the vet all the time with ear infections and our dog would be scratching her ears in pain and discomfort. Now, we just put a few drops in her ears after she swims and all is well. No more infections and her ears actually smell good. Not sure what this product was intended to prevent, but we are very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Miracle wash
customer_reviews.text: Talk about an amazing purchase! My dog has had issues with ear infections and ear yeast infections constantly since she was a puppy and nothing has helped prevent them, tried everything from prescription powders to drying her ears out nightly with a towel and a blow dryer and it just kept happening. Now I give her regular ear washes and the teatree oil has kept her from having any issues for this whole time! Absolute godsend
customer_reviews.author: Strigas

customer_reviews.title: Vet recommended
customer_reviews.text: Used once so far, vet recommended it, I like the fresh smell , my lil fur baby seems to enjoy the fresh feeling she gets from it as well
customer_reviews.author: Erica Tinker

customer_reviews.title: Great for water in the ears or allergies prone dog
customer_reviews.text: Our allergy prone dog loves swimming in our pool but used to get a lot of ear infections. We make sure to clean his ears out with this tea tree oil after swim and the ear infections stopped. This is our second bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Leighlers

customer_reviews.title: Smells sooooo good!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help keep my cavalier's ears clean. She loves to play outside and gets quite dirty when she does. I love this ear wash! Just using this wash alone makes her smell so good. Very pleasant smell, and I have noticed her ears overall more clean. I even made my Dad take it to use on his cocker spaniel who he also has trouble keeping his ears clean. Will definitely buy more when this runs out. Much cheaper also here on amazon and came in quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Best pet ear wash I’ve tried!
customer_reviews.text: Really brought up & out dirt deeper in the ear, so I could wipe away! Smells great — not as “medicinal” smelling as other products I’ve used. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: VZ

customer_reviews.title: Great product, too small for my needs
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that kept this from five stars is the size. I love the smell of the product, and so far it seems to work nicely, however the size of the product isn't really realistic for my shih tzu. I've used about 1/5 of the bottle in just one use. Maybe buy two if you're buying this for the add-on price. Will buy again. Would recomment.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Gray

customer_reviews.title: This works well
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it smells and it works well cleaning my dogs ears. My dog has a lot of ear problems (including infections). I have been using this product for at least a year now.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce K.

customer_reviews.title: nice ear wash for dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes this one. It is a bit thin and I have another one he benefits from too so I use both This one does not stain and seems to refresh and clean his ears. I clean his ears daily but only a couple of drops in both ears because this is what he likes so he does not get ear infections any more. We tried various ways and this is his preference. I like the scent of this product too. We use it sparingly to very good effect.
customer_reviews.author: Estar

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for your dog first aid kit
customer_reviews.text: Great solution to have on hand to clean your dogs ears and smells good as well. We use this all the time and none of our dogs ever have ear infections.
customer_reviews.author: Helen A.

customer_reviews.title: clean ears don’t mean she will listen
customer_reviews.text: it cleaned my dogs ears but she still doesn’t listen. Dam kids!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for our pup
customer_reviews.text: This caused our dog to have a skin reaction inside her ears. She has sensitive skin, so that's not unusual. NaturVet refunded me for my purchase just as the guarantee says they will. Quick and no hassle return, so I'm not complaining.
customer_reviews.author: Anna May

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works
customer_reviews.text: Dog kept shaking his head, so we used this to clean out his ears. No more shaking and happy dog. Really easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: STL Guy

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I use this as part of my dog's bath time routine. So easy to use, just drip in he ear, massage, and rinse. I follow with a cotton swab to gently wipe out the wax that was loosened, and I can see all the yellow dirty wax that my regular pet ear wipes don't remove. It has a slight smell but it goes away within a couple of minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Better than the last
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time that I have ordered this ear wash solution. Previously, I used the one from the vet and when my fur buddy saw the bottle he ran. He doesn't do that with this ear wash.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell it leaves behind
customer_reviews.text: Very clean smell and dogs ears stay clean and odor free. They don't like the liquid going in the ears, but once I start to massage it into the canal and they can shake out the excess, they are fine, no more scratching at the ears and no redness. I love the smell it leaves in the ears.
customer_reviews.author: momoftwoboxers

customer_reviews.title: I'll order more of this product. Updated- I won't order more.
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice- clean, not perfumey, does a great job keeping the pup's ears clear and clean. Just exactly what I needed and I will order more. Review update: the tea tree oil or something in this formula seems to be an irritant to the pup's ears. Now looking for new, more gentle product.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I got the first bottle from my vet after my dog had a bad ear infection. The vet recommended that I use this product twice a week to clean my dog's ears, which I've done, and her ears have been infection free since. Seems to me the product works.
customer_reviews.author: Dear Reader

customer_reviews.title: My swimming labradoodle
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for year on my labradoodle after every swim or bath and she has healthy ears and smells good.
customer_reviews.author: ECKT

customer_reviews.title: Cats hate it going in their ears
customer_reviews.text: I assume product works but, I wore most of it!!! Cats hate it going in their ears. They did stop constantly scratching them after I used, however. Smells very good.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon West

customer_reviews.title: Ear therapy
customer_reviews.text: This product works well when our dog’s ears are red and sensitive
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Best ear cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is the best ear cleaner ever. I use it on our poodle and schnauzer. Works great.

customer_reviews.title: Clean Ears
customer_reviews.text: Used once a week to keep my dogs ears clean and smelling good.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lim

customer_reviews.title: ... years to clean my lab's ears and it works great, I don't pour it in his ears I ...
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using this product for years to clean my lab's ears and it works great, I don't pour it in his ears I just lightly apply it to a cotton pad and clean the ear, I also apply it to a cotton swab to get a deeper clean. Smells great and not filled with unwanted chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Spender

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Naturvet!
customer_reviews.text: So much better than the other wash I was using in my baby's ear. She is a Westie and is prone to ear infections. Because of this, I was her ears pretty regularly. I was told by a friend about finding a wash with Teastree oil in it. I was glad to find this. It is so gentle and seems to be doing the job. My girl still hates me doing it, but at least now I know she is not being hurt by any alcohol. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Q.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem to bother/irritate my pups (besides the fact that I'm putting liquid in their ears). I love that it smells pretty good; unlike other ear cleaners I have used, it has a pleasant smell.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: BEST FOR EARS AND ALSO PAWS ......
customer_reviews.text: BEST, NO STING , PLEASANT SMELL, ALSO USE WITH COTTON BALL AND CLEAN YOUR PET'S PAWS WITH IT, WHERE THE INFECTIONS TRAIL BEGINS ......
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD D. LERUD

customer_reviews.title: It keeps their finicky ears from any residual build up and smelling nice! It is not an antidote for an ear ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this once a week as an ear wipe for the two basset hounds. Pouring a bit on a cotton ball, and swiping around the inner ear flap, It keeps their finicky ears from any residual build up and smelling nice! It is not an antidote for an ear infection! More of a very good maintenance product for dogs that need a bit up ear upkeep.
customer_reviews.author: ToherLulu

customer_reviews.title: it's gentle
customer_reviews.text: I rate this with high marks because it is gentle and the tea tree oil is healing. I can use this in my dogs' ears everyday, if I need to. One of my dogs is a lab and he seems to need his ears cleaned many times a week. This product doesn't smell like medicine, so I think that helps because it doesn't smell like the vet. So, my dog willingly lets me clean his ears. I would recommend this product to anyone who cleans their dogs ears, and especially, to anyone who has a dog that needs ear cleaning regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Negowski

customer_reviews.title: This product really works!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say they enjoy having something squirted into their ears, but if they scratch this product really works well.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth lovic

customer_reviews.title: Love this. I squirt a small amount in ear ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I squirt a small amount in ear dog's ear & clean them gently with q-tips.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Andras

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice and doesn't seem to bother my dog too much. On the fence about the tea tree oil--you'll find mixed reviews of this being good or not for the ears. I think the less scent and less ingredients the better.
customer_reviews.author: ACPT1980

customer_reviews.title: I was taking my dog to the vet every three ...
customer_reviews.text: I was taking my dog to the vet every three months for ear problems $65 dollars visit. I started this and it has been a year No vet.
customer_reviews.author: Ila B. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: I've used this brand for years (many generations of long ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this brand for years (many generations of long eared dogs prone to ear infections and short eared dogs). I found that if I use it regularly I prevent ear infections all together. I used to have a dog that was really prone to them (a golden retriever) and once I started using after every bath or every time she went for a swim, I never had another ear infection to deal with. I tried other things that would dry out the ear to much and other issues, this brand has had no ill side effects
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Lori J. Lytle

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Just a few days of use and our dog Trixie is doing much better with her ears. I highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Eh... not so great
customer_reviews.text: My Shih Tzu frequently gets gunky ears.. This cleanser didn't remove the waxy buildup on the inside of his ears, so I had to purchase another brand (which worked better and cost less)
customer_reviews.author: KarlyJeanBean

customer_reviews.title: Lasting Results from a Single Use
customer_reviews.text: Didn't anticipate its effectiveness; It eliminated my pup's ear odor after the first application... really impressed! My bichon spaniel's ears have remained odor-free at day seven from a single wash. Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: B. Wild.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Worked amazingly on my shi tzu. Will definitely buy again!

customer_reviews.title: my pup hates this ear wash but I absolutely love it. it cleans well and anything with tea ...
customer_reviews.text: my pup hates this ear wash but I absolutely love it. it cleans well and anything with tea tree oil is awesome in my books.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Not sticky. More like watery and smells fine. I use it in every 3 days. Cost was less than 5 dollars. Don't waste your money on some other branded expensive one. I am happy that I chose this one.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Smells great
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent of tea tree. I have been using this for my shih tzu's for 4 yrs and have never had a problem.

customer_reviews.text: My dog gets stinky ears every once in a while so I use this product and her ears stay nice and clean for a long time. I like how the product smells good and that it's working because she stops scratching at her ears or shaking her head.

customer_reviews.text: We have a rescue dog, and he finds such relief with this ear wash. One of the few things he'll let us get near him for. I would call that a good product.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing. I have ordered it multiple times

customer_reviews.text: Ordered three bottles of this stuff. I have two big golden retrievers and they of course get ear infections. Have been using it on them for about a month -- no ear infections to report so it is working as a very good proactive ear infection deflector :)

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We got a rescue dog and he came with ear troubles. He has long ears so once they have trouble they seem to always have trouble. Well this cleaner was the best thing I've ever used and it really works. We use it on him once ot twice and no problems for some time.

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time. It helps keep my dogs ears clean. It's easy to use. My dog doesn't mind it too much.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Was using Oti-clens from the vet and looked for something bigger and cheaper. This is not for dogs who have chronic ear mites or ear moisture. My dogs ears got worse and now we are off to the vet for the good stuff. Don't try to save money, get the real deal.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product with natural ingredients
customer_reviews.text: It does the job with no pain to my pets.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for itchy doggie ears, at a wonderful price.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by this ear wash. Our floppy-eared pound dog has a tendency to itchy ears in the summer especially when she is swimming a lot. This product works great! And we've had no problems with ear mites either since using it. Although LadyBug doesn't love having it put in her ears, she seems to like use wiping them out and they smell great when we're done (a lot better than with the stuff we got from the vet). Just make sure you hold on to their head when rubbing it in prior to wiping out the ears because if they shake while it's in there it goes everywhere. Great product.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but stains green.

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff for my retriever's ears
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff for my retriever's ears. I need to clean them on a weekly basis. This is nice an natural, really does the trick. Highly recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Works well and is worth buying!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I've used it for years for cleaning my German Shepherd dog's ears, and she has not had an ear infection for a very long time. It is worth buying!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine T.

customer_reviews.title: ... before and it was ok but I kept fighting bad smell within a week
customer_reviews.text: I used Mistyc Ear before and it was ok but I kept fighting bad smell within a week. Not with this one. ears get cleaned once a week sometimes every two weeks and there is no smell. Maleucea (tea tree oil) is one of the ingredient which is a disinfectant, antifungal, antiinflammatory, so that may be the reason why. I read that maleucea is poisonous to dogs but based on information only 100% strength is poisonous, so do not let your dog get into your essential oil stash and it will be fine. Products containing tea tree oil concentrations less than 1-2% are generally considered non-toxic if used according to labeled directions.
customer_reviews.author: DolnaM

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm and saves us a visit to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Use this all the time to clean our mastiff's ears. Works like a charm and saves us a visit to the vet.

customer_reviews.text: No harsh chemicals, I can clean my dog & cat's ears every week without any irritation.

customer_reviews.title: This product is wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I use this now on a regular basis when I clean my 3 goldens ears. Smells nice and works great. Decent size bottle and pricing is good too.

customer_reviews.title: No complaints so far
customer_reviews.text: Smells good too. I like that its natural or more natural than other stuff on the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product for your pets ear health. The Tea Tree Oil scent is refreshing compared to a stinky dog ear and helps to heal up any issues with dog ear health.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Bruinsma

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned my dogs ears really well. Smells great and moisturized his ears.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Kokinda

customer_reviews.title: My favorite dog ear cleaner
customer_reviews.text: My favorite dog ear cleaner. I have tried several but none seem to work as well as this one! It doesn't make my dog's ears burn and make him wince like other cleaners.
customer_reviews.author: Buckobob

customer_reviews.title: Works as cleaner and rinse
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done - floppy ears get very dirty and I use this regularly. They hate it, though! Just the smell sends them running.
customer_reviews.author: ERC

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: My previous dog had awful allergies and would constantly get ear infections. This was the only product I found,when used often, would reduce the number of ear infections he would get. I use this now as a regular ear wash on my current dog. I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Ckrets47

customer_reviews.title: Gets rid of ear infections
customer_reviews.text: Tried this on our dogs' ears. It does a good job of clearing infections. We like that it is a more natural alternative than using medications. Smells good too.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Best product to keep ear infection away for my dog!

customer_reviews.text: Best ear wash I have found in 30 years of dog ownership!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My baby boy boxer's ears are back to great. Thanks

customer_reviews.text: Does a great job. Smells nice. Doesn't drip if you use a cotton ball or cotton swab.

customer_reviews.text: Gentle clearing that doesn't bother my dogs ears terribly. Fresh scent.

customer_reviews.text: Works great! Our labs and Griff get their ears cleaned with this product.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 floppy eared dogs. This product does a great job keeping their ears clean and healthy and is well tolerated by all.

product_meta.title: NaturVet – Ear Wash Liquid - Plus Tea Tree Oil – Gentle Formula Dissolves Ear Wax & Removes Debris – Enhanced with Aloe & Baby Powder Scent – for Dogs & Cats
feature_bullets: Ear Wash Liquid Plus Tea Tree Oil’s gentle, yet effective formula is designed to help dissolve ear wax and remove foreign debris.
Ear wash helps reduce ear odor, is safe for routine ear cleaning and contains soothing Aloe.
Can be used as often as needed and is especially recommended after bathing or swimming. Suitable for cats and dogs of all life stages.
Formulated with Veterinarian recommended levels of tea tree oil and a fresh baby powder scent.
cGMP Compliant, Manufactured in the USA
